column4: Is there any specific way dvd witers need to be configured that i should know about?
k3b says it can write, but i've tried to burn dvd .iso and yet it says it is blank
after going into the menu and choosing Tools -> Burn DVD ISO Image ?
have you previously gone to Settings -> K3b Setup ?
yea, did that and burnt the iso ; but it shows up as empty  - i'm trying again now
went to Settings -> configure k3b , and under device it confirms that it has picked up the new dvd writer i just bought
the other one (K3b setup) checks/changes permissions of a bunch of things if they are set incorrectly
what am i looking for?
in k3b setup ; how should things be?
it should load up stuff about 'Settings', 'Devices' and 'External Programs'
yea..no, how should they be setup?
its there; but  i dont know if it is right or wrong
k3b again burnt a blank dvd
it's showing you 'how things should be'. is "Apply" clickable or disabled?
its disabled
un-clickable
so it does a complete burn with no errors, and it still appears blank to you when it's done?
thats about it
I'd use google to find out if other people have complained about that drive in linux
ok, a project for tomorrow then
